name: Dog On
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • J to Bark
  • K to Jump

Goal:

  • Make friends with as many dogs as you can on your walk.

The leash is elastic, swing yourself back and forth to gain momentum and run into other dogs.


Credits:

Design/Programming

  • Ryan Barekat

Dog Wranglers (art/sounds)
